name: Google Play
tagline: Information about my Google Play Apps
body:
### Welcome to BlazingDamon's homepage
I am an independent app developer with one app published.

###Click A Hole
An incremental game that involves digging a hole to the center of the Earth. Includes upgrades to click power, auto-click speed, 13 different types of materials, and ascension aspects. It is currently on version 1.0, and was originally released on 1/3/15. It is available here: [Play Store](https://play.google.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
